name: WGJ 139 - Guardian
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam 139.

Guide wisps to the end gate along the Sky Garden. But, beware of the Obelisks. If they hit you, you will lose a wisp and, if you have none, you will die. Let me know what you think.

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause
